page.title: 09Changing Times In Garston
page.content: I can remember that where there is new Iceland Frozen Food Centre on Speke Road once was a Woolworth Store. They have now completed a new{By-pass} which has done a great deal to make Garston quieter. Where the old Lennon's{Store}used to be on Speke Road they have opened a new Woolton Carpet Centre. Workmen are also putting in a{new clock}in St. Michael's Church tower whilst others are building a{new Sports Centre}on Garston Park. Lennon's new Store has already been taken over by Gateway Foodmarkets. There used to be a Public House called Mona's Castle at the junction of St. Mary's Road and Speke Road. It has now been demolished and some benches and litter bins have been put there. Some billboards have been erected and a small area has been grassed over. ANDREW MACOY (9)
